DO_PRST_SQL_VAL_EXPR.Value: UPDATE GT_INCTV FROM GT_INCTV SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE( GT_INCTV.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';GIVEN_INCTV_IS_NOT_HAVING_VALID_COMBINATION_OF_MKTNG_PGM_OR_INCTV_STATUS_CODE_OR_INCTV_TYPE_CODE') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT MKTNG_PGM_NBR FROM MKTNG_PGM T3 WHERE GT_INCTV.MKTNG_PGM_NBR= T3.MKTNG_PGM_NBR) OR NOT EXISTS(SELECT INCTV_STATUS_CODE FROM INCTV_STATUS T4 WHERE GT_INCTV.INCTV_STATUS_CODE= T4.INCTV_STATUS_CODE) OR NOT EXISTS(SELECT INCTV_TYPE_CODE FROM INCTV_TYPE T5 WHERE GT_INCTV.INCTV_TYPE_CODE= T5.INCTV_TYPE_CODE)

DO_PRST_SRC_DB_EXPR.Value: UPDATE NC_INCTV FROM NC_INCTV SET SYS_ERR_CODE = (COALESCE( NC_INCTV.SYS_ERR_CODE,'') ||';GIVEN_INCTV_IS_NOT_HAVING_VALID_COMBINATION_OF_MKTNG_PGM_OR_INCTV_STATUS_CODE_OR_INCTV_TYPE_CODE') , SYS_ERR_SVRTY = 'SEVERE_ERROR' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT MKTNG_PGM_NBR FROM MKTNG_PGM T3 WHERE NC_INCTV.MKTNG_PGM_NBR= T3.MKTNG_PGM_NBR) OR NOT EXISTS(SELECT INCTV_STATUS_CODE FROM INCTV_STATUS T4 WHERE NC_INCTV.INCTV_STATUS_CODE= T4.INCTV_STATUS_CODE) OR NOT EXISTS(SELECT INCTV_TYPE_CODE FROM INCTV_TYPE T5 WHERE NC_INCTV.INCTV_TYPE_CODE= T5.INCTV_TYPE_CODE)

RULE_EXPR.Value: <sql_validation ErrorCode="GIVEN_INCTV_IS_NOT_HAVING_VALID_COMBINATION_OF_MKTNG_PGM_OR_INCTV_STATUS_CODE_OR_INCTV_TYPE_CODE" ErrorSeverity="SEVERE_ERROR" Service="BCM_MASTER" Document="INCTV"> <actionType> <Insert Value="true"/> <Update Value="true"/> </actionType> <fromCtx> <property Service="BCM_MASTER" Document="INCTV"/> </fromCtx> <searchCtx> <queryLinks/> <where> <custom>NOT EXISTS(SELECT MKTNG_PGM_NBR FROM MKTNG_PGM t3 WHERE t1.MKTNG_PGM_NBR= t3.MKTNG_PGM_NBR)</custom> <or/> <custom>NOT EXISTS(SELECT INCTV_STATUS_CODE FROM inctv_status t4 WHERE t1.INCTV_STATUS_CODE= t4.INCTV_STATUS_CODE)</custom> <or/> <custom>NOT EXISTS(SELECT INCTV_TYPE_CODE FROM INCTV_TYPE t5 WHERE t1.INCTV_TYPE_CODE= t5.INCTV_TYPE_CODE)</custom> </where> </searchCtx> </sql_validation>
